creditline: Gift of Jack A. and Aviva Robinson
description: Cloth bands on reverse edge, No backing cloth, lining fragments. Hand woven coarse red wool ground fabric with polychrome wool embroidery. One edge has a narrow embroidered border (top in photo). On the reverse, there is a striped cotton edging on three sides. There is no backing, binding, or fringe. Ground fabric is pieced near/over edge. Large center square with border of smaller motifs on all four sides.
medium: Wool, cotton; chain stitch, checkered chain stitch, continuous-thread couching, outline, back, fishbone stitch
title: Ilgich
